name: mailslurp/mailslurp-client-php
description: ## Introduction  [MailSlurp](https://www.mailslurp.com) is an Email API for developers and QA testers. It let's users: - create emails addresses on demand - receive emails and attachments in code - send templated HTML emails  ## About  This page contains the REST API documentation for MailSlurp. All requests require API Key authentication passed as an `x-api-key` header.
